title: Travel And Tour World becomes the official media partner of ibtm world - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Travel And Tour World becomes the official media partner of ibtm world
Travel And Tour World announces further collaboration with ibtm world (formerly known as EIBTM) being one of the official media partners. Reed Travel Exhibitions, the organizers of ibtm world and Travel And Tour World continues their partnership collaborating, promoting and aiding in successful travel trade events around the world.
ibtm world, like every year will take place in Barcelona, Spain. This year the event will run from 17th of November to 19th of November. Last year, the global travel industry witnessed the final edition of EIBTM (now ibtm world) and promised a huge opportunity for this year. In 2014, over 15,500 delegates attended the event over the 3 days and hailed the platform for providing a innovation and a fantastic networking opportunity.
As an official media partner, Travel And Tour World will be doing a comprehensive pre and post show report. Apart from that, a plethora of information from the show floor of ibtm world will be made available for the global audience interested in keeping their travel business abreast with the latest developments in the meetings industry.
Travel And Tour world invites everyone to Barcelona and collect the latest issue from their stand. There will be innovative sessions from us to assist and enhance your brand identity.
About ibtm World
ibtm world (formerly known as EIBTM) is the flagship event of the ibtm events portfolio with 8 events across the globe and owned by Reed Travel Exhibitions, part of the Reed Elsevier Group.
ibtm world is the leading global event for the meetings and events industry, held in the vibrant business and tourism destination of Barcelona. The three day event delivers a focused business environment, thought provoking professional education and networking for Exhibitors, Hosted Buyers and Trade Visitors.
The unique Hosted Buyer Programme sets ibtm world apart from other exhibitions, hosting over 4,000 top level decision makers who place international business, and facilitating over 78,000 one to one appointments between exhibitors and buyers.
About Travel And Tour World
Travel and Tour World (TTW), a travel trade media and an information platform, is an all-inclusive and far-reaching B2B travel magazine with a readership of more than 2, 50,000 worldwide. It endorses more than 90 trade shows where the magazine is distributed free to the decision makers of the global travel industry. In a very short span of time, our readership has augmented to 2, 50,000 which include niche readers from travel industry professionals like Tour Operators and Agents, Destination Management Companies, MICE Planners and many more.
TTW furnishes a great prospect to reach the B2B travel readers across the world. It is not only a boost from the business outlook but also crafts a global unique readership.
TTW imparts travel professionals with an upright global outlook through profound coverage of all tourism sectors including prominent hotels and its reviews, airlines, destinations, cruises, meeting and convention centres and lots more. The magazine keeps one abreast with the avant-garde trends as well as the latest technological boons of the industry. From MICE destinations to awe-inspiring locations, TTW wraps it all. Its gives you an insight into the Highlights and Reviews of all the International trade fairs from around the globe.
Along with the I-pad and Android accessibility, delve into Travel and Tour World in a unique flip-book format, which is freely downloadable and readable online.
